datasetHeader: Alternative data: 360Â° view of Q-Commerce companies
datasetSubheader: Alternative data, also known as external data, is information collected from non-traditional, external data sources, generated either by individuals, business processes, or sensors. In businesses, it is leveraged by managers and investors to extract valuable insights, generate business opportunities, improve deal sourcing, and guide investment decisions.
categoriesSubheader: Below you will find our full data offering consisting of a total of 20 unique alternative data categories from 10 different sources.
